mediaCasosEjecutados.text: Define testing strategy: Establish which functionalities require manual vs automated testing
Create test case repository: Document reusable cases in standard format
Integrate QA in planning: Participate from user story definition to identify acceptance criteria
Establish Definition of Done: Include quality criteria before moving to production
Train development team: Promote quality ownership from code
Implement smoke tests: Validate critical functionalities after each deploy

densidadDefectos.text: Implement code reviews: Peer review before merge to prevent bugs
Define Definition of Done: Clear quality criteria before considering story finished
Train in unit testing: Developers must validate their code before QA
Implement integration testing: Validate module interfaces automatically
Analyze problematic modules: Identify areas with higher bug concentration for refactoring
Establish code quality metrics: Cyclomatic complexity, code smells, technical debt
Implement shift-left testing: Involve QA from user story design to prevent defects
Create production-like development environment: Reduce bugs from environment differences

tiempoPromedioResolucion.text: Improve QA-Dev communication: Reduce time from report to work start
Establish critical SLAs: Maximum priority bugs must be resolved in 48 hours
Standardize bug reporting: Include clear steps, screenshots and logs for faster reproduction
Implement stable testing environment: Avoid delays from infrastructure issues
Create responsibility matrix: Define who handles each bug type to avoid bounces

bugsCriticosDetectados.text: Implement quality gate: No production release with open critical bugs
Establish war room: Focused sessions with Dev to resolve critical bugs in real time
Define severity criteria: Align with development on what is critical, high, medium, low
Implement regression testing: Validate that fixes do not generate new bugs
Create pre-production checklist: Minimum validations before each release
Analyze root cause: Document common critical bug patterns for prevention
Implement code reviews: Mandatory peer review for critical functionalities

estadoBugsCriticos.text: Urgent: Freeze new features and focus team on stabilization
Establish daily triage: Prioritize and allocate resources to pending critical bugs
Review prioritization: Validate that all critical bugs really are
Implement notification system: Alert stakeholders about new critical bugs
Define escalation process: What to do when critical bugs exceed SLA
Create knowledge base: Document recurring bugs and their solutions
Implement post-mortem: Analyze each critical bug to prevent recurrence
Excellent work! Continue with this level of response

eficienciaResolucion.text: Establish workflow: Define clear process from report to bug closure
Implement daily syncs: Brief QA-Dev meetings to unblock obstacles
Define SLAs by priority: Establish maximum resolution time by criticality
Standardize bug reporting: Template with steps, evidence and reproduction environment
Create communication channel: Slack/Teams dedicated for quick bug triage
Implement QA-Dev retrospectives: Identify process improvements each sprint
Train on tools: Azure DevOps, Jira or tracking system you use
